abstract: Most banks have recovered from the recent financial collapse, but the two companies reported continuing effects on earnings.
snippet: Most banks have recovered from the recent financial collapse, but the two companies reported continuing effects on earnings.
lead_paragraph: More than four years after the financial crisis, many big banks have regained their footing. But Bank of America and Citigroup remain dogged by the past.

headline.main: Mortgage Crisis Lingers On at Citigroup and Bank of America
headline.print_headline: Mortgage Crisis Lingers On At Citi and Bank of America

byline.original: By Ben Protess and Jessica Silver-Greenberg
